definition: Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union)/abbr. for 獨立國家聯合體|独立国家联合体
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: China attaches great importance to developing the friendly and mutually beneficial cooperation with CIS countries.
sentences.chinese: 中方高度重視同獨聯體國家發展友好互利合作關係。
